EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-06-26-Minneapolis-Invite.Email Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Minneapolis IT Networking Dinner
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I am pleased to cordially invite you to join myself and dozens of our fellow IT leaders in Minneapolis for the upcoming Executive Networking Event: Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/minneapolis-it-networking-dinner-tickets-46149192477]]> hosted by Turbonomic this Thursday, June 28th. We have had some last-minute spots open up and we’d love for you to join us for this exclusive event. Join me and our community of your technology peers to share knowledge on tackling the challenges posed by next-gen IT advancements and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of the hybrid cloud. Executive Networking Series Minneapolis Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/minneapolis-it-networking-dinner-tickets-46149192477]]> Thursday, June 28 | Lela | 6:00 pm 5601 West 78th Street, Bloomington, MN
I hope to see you there, Tami
Tami Pearlstein Field Marketing Manager, Turbonomic
